title: First ship arrives at Vizhinjam port in Trivandrum carrying mammoth cranes from China
selftext:
News: The first ship that arrived at Vizhinjam port here carrying cranes was given a water salute by the tug boats which pulled the vessel into the Rs 7,700 crore deep-water international port on Thursday, official sources said.

Adani is building India’s first and largest container transshipment terminal in Trivandrum, the capital of Kerala. This port is predicted to transform India’s maritime trade and economy.
